name: Reverse Flutter
instruction: Lie facedown and extend elbows out wide, keeping hands together in front of your face. Rest chin or forehead on hands. Engaging core muscles, lift both legs off the floor to hip height or slightly past hip height, whichever feels comfortable. Lift one leg and then the other in a flutter motion, as though you're swimming. Repeat until the set is complete.
hints: Engage your core muscles and perform the flutter motion in a controlled manner. While performing the reverse flutter, breathe deeply and as naturally as possible
